Tell me about Aren: [arendesai.com](Welcome to Aren Desai's personal website) He is a Computer Science & Data Science BS student at UW-Madison, with expertise in programming, data science, and robotics. His portfolio includes projects like MarketSimOptimizer and WRoverSoftware.
What are Aren's technical skills?: [arendesai.com](Technical Skills Section) Python, SQL, R, Java, C/C++/C#, JavaScript, Julia, MATLAB, OpenGL, WebGL, Unity, Blender, Gazebo, ROS/ROS2, Pandas, NumPy, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, Keras.
What projects has Aren worked on?: [arendesai.com/portfolio](Portfolio Section) MarketSimOptimizer (MISO market simulation), LMP Forecasting (LEAR & DNN price models), GCP Website (hosted LLM), Boat (Blender/Unity 3D model), Book of Joe (web-based portfolio game), CyberCity (3D cyberpunk city environment), WRoverSoftware (UW-Madison rover software).
What is Aren's educational background?: [arendesai.com](Education Section) BS in Computer Science & Data Science at UW-Madison, expected Spring 2025.
Can you tell me about Aren's coursework?: [arendesai.com/coursework](Coursework Section) Includes advanced topics in data science, machine learning, computer graphics, and robotics.

What is the Wisconsin Rover project?: [github.com/WisconsinRobotics/WRoverSoftware](WRoverSoftware GitHub) Software developed for a rover at UW-Madison, utilizing ROS2 and robotic systems.
